title: Got reported.
body: Just got a pop up that said I was in a warning for unsportman. is there away to verify what game i was reported??? playing game since season 2. and i dont think i have ever received a message like that. am i going to get banned?

replies.body: I don't want to give out your personal chat history here on the boards of course, but if you do really want more context on what happened and little better explanation, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our player behavior team should be able to go over everything with you there.
Not likely if you keep acting this way you will and i'm a pro about getting bans : ^ )
